snippet: Mexican federal police say they have arrested a man they believe is a high-level financial operator for the Knights Templar drug cartel....

headline.print_headline: Mexico Arrests Alleged Drug Cartel Financier
headline.main: Mexico Arrests Alleged Drug Cartel Financier

lead_paragraph: Mexican federal police say they have arrested a man they believe is a high-level financial operator for the Knights Templar drug cartel.
